<style>
/* FONT IMPORT & GENERAL STYLING */
@import url('[https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Assistant:wght@400;600;700;800&display=swap](https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Assistant:wght@400;600;700;800&display=swap)');
body {
    font-family: 'Assistant', sans-serif;
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
    color: #1a2b48; 
}

/* --- LAYOUT & CARDS --- */
.page-container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 1.5rem 1rem; /* Reduced top padding */
}
.content-card {
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
    border-radius: 0.75rem;
    padding: 2.5rem;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
    margin-bottom: 2.5rem; /* Reduced bottom margin */
}

/* --- HEADER --- */
.header-section {
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: 2.5rem; /* Reduced margin */
    padding: 0 1rem;
}
.header-section h1 {
    font-size: 2.8rem;
    font-weight: 800;
    line-height: 1.2;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}
.header-section p {
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    color: #555;
    max-width: 800px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

/* --- SECTION HEADINGS --- */
.section-heading {
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 2.25rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
}

/* --- NEW SUBSECTION HEADING --- */
.subsection-heading {
    text-align: left;
    font-size: 1.75rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
    color: #1a2b48;
}


/* --- WORKFLOW/METHODOLOGY --- */
.workflow-container {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column; /* Default to vertical */
    align-items: center;
    gap: 1.5rem;
}
.workflow-step {
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
    border: 1px solid #e9ecef;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
    padding: 1.5rem;
    border-radius: 0.75rem;
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}
.workflow-step h4 {
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
    color: #0A4C6A;
}
.workflow-step p {
    flex-grow: 1;
    color: #333;
}
.workflow-arrow {
    font-size: 2rem;
    color: #ccc;
    transform: rotate(90deg); /* Default to down arrow */
    align-self: center; /* Center arrow vertically in column mode */
}
.award-highlight {
    background-color: #E6F3F8;
    border: 1px solid #BEE1F0;
    color: #0A4C6A;
    padding: 0.75rem;
    border-radius: 8px;
    margin-top: 1rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 0.9em;
}

/* Switch to horizontal layout on larger screens */
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
    .workflow-container {
        flex-direction: row;
        align-items: stretch; /* Make steps equal height */
    }
    .workflow-arrow {
        transform: rotate(0deg); /* Switch to right arrow */
    }
}

/* Hide arrow if it's the last step */
.workflow-step:last-of-type + .workflow-arrow {
    display: none;
}


/* --- PUBLICATIONS & OUTPUTS --- */
.publication-item {
    padding: 1.5rem 0;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #e9ecef;
}
.publication-item:last-child {
    border-bottom: none;
    padding-bottom: 0;
}
.pub-title {
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}
.pub-journal {
    font-style: italic;
    color: #555;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}
.pub-links {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}
.btn-pub {
  padding: 8px 18px;
  font-size: 0.9em;
  font-weight: 600;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  background-color: #0A4C6A;
  color: #fff;
  border: 2px solid #0A4C6A;
}
.btn-pub:hover {
  background-color: #083c54;
  border-color: #083c54;
  color: #fff;
}


/* --- IMPACT CARD & NEW PUBLICATION CARD STYLE --- */
.impact-card {
    background: #1a2b48;
    color: #fff;
    border-radius: 0.75rem;
    padding: 2.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 3rem;
}
.impact-card h3, .impact-card .subsection-heading { /* Apply subsection style here too */
    font-size: 1.75rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
    color: #fff;
    text-align: left; /* Align left */
}
.impact-card .pub-title {
    color: #fff;
}
.impact-card .pub-journal {
    color: #ccc;
}
.impact-card .publication-item {
    border-bottom-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
}
.impact-card .btn-pub {
    color: #1a2b48;
    background-color: #fff;
    border-color: #fff;
}
.impact-card .btn-pub:hover {
    background-color: #eee;
    border-color: #eee;
}

/* --- SUPERVISOR & PARTNER STYLES --- */
.team-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(220px, 1fr));
  gap: 2rem;
  text-align: center;
}
.team-member img {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  margin: 0 auto 1rem auto;
  object-fit: cover;
  border: 3px solid #e9ecef;
}
.member-name {
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}
.member-title {
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: #555;
  line-height: 1.4;
}
.logo-grid {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 2.5rem;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
}
.logo-grid img {
    height: 55px;
    width: auto;
}

</style>

    <header class="header-section">
        <h2>Forecasting for Health Supply Chains</h2>
        <p>My PhD research project is focused on improving demand forecasting for family planning to ensure contraceptives are always available when and where they are needed.</p>

    <div class="content-card">
        <h3 class="section-heading">The Core Challenge: What Was Lost?</h3>
        <p class="text-center max-w-4xl mx-auto">
            In public health, "zero demand" doesn't mean "zero need"â€”it often just means the shelves were empty. When health facilities run out of stock, the true demand from the community goes unrecorded. This "censored" or "lost" demand data leads to flawed forecasts, which in turn causes chronic under-stocking and reinforces a cycle of supply failure. My research focuses on breaking this cycle.
        </p>
    </div>

                <h4>Estimate Lost Demand</h4>
                <p>Build the <strong>Truncated Conformal Kalman Filter (TCKF)</strong> to reconstruct true, unobserved demand from incomplete data caused by stockouts and service disruptions.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="workflow-arrow">&rarr;</div>
            <div class="workflow-step">
                <h4>Optimize Inventory</h4>
                <p>Use improved forecasts and data-driven prediction intervals to inform smarter inventory policies that reduce stockouts while maintaining efficiency.</p>
